forecast.name: Overnight
forecast.detailedForecast: Partly cloudy, with a low around 32. West wind around 10 mph.

forecast.name: Thursday
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny, with a high near 51. West wind 9 to 14 mph.

weather_report:
As the early hours of Thursday dawn over Boston, a delicate chill drapes itself across the city, painting the air with a crispness that heralds the promise of a sunny day ahead. The night sky gradually succumbs to a gentle lightening, offering whispers of clarity even as a few stray clouds linger. With temperatures resting around the low thirties, the wind carries a cool undertone, urging those who venture outside to seek warmth in layers—perhaps a sturdy jacket accompanied by a cozy scarf to fend off the morning’s bite. 

As the sun rises higher, the warmth will seep in, transforming the landscape into a brighter scene, inviting flutters of spring to stir within the confines of winter’s retreat. A high near fifty-one beckons outdoor enthusiasts to enjoy understated pursuits: a leisurely stroll through the tranquil paths of Boston Common, where budding flowers begin to tease their colors, or perhaps a quiet sit at a favorite café, warming hands around a steaming mug. Today sits poised as a delightful reminder of the transition towards spring—a day to embrace the outdoors, if only for an hour or two, allowing the sun to lift spirits as it casts its gentle glow over the city.
